name: Synthetic Academic Paper Evaluation Dataset
description: Evaluation dataset for testing fine-tuned academic paper retrieval. Based on real s2orc patterns with Medicine (43%), Computer Science (14%), Biology (13%), etc.

queries.query: Deep learning approaches for medical image segmentation in diagnostic imaging

correct_doc.title: Deep Learning Approaches for Medical Image Segmentation in Diagnostic Imaging
correct_doc.abstract: Recent advances in deep learning have revolutionized medical image analysis, particularly in segmentation tasks for diagnostic imaging. This comprehensive review examines convolutional neural networks, U-Net architectures, and transformer-based approaches for automated segmentation of medical images including CT scans, MRI, and X-rays. We analyze performance metrics across different anatomical structures and discuss clinical implementation challenges.

distractor_docs.title: Natural Language Processing for Clinical Documentation Analysis
distractor_docs.abstract: Electronic health records contain vast amounts of unstructured clinical text that could benefit from automated analysis. This study presents novel NLP techniques for extracting clinical insights from physician notes, discharge summaries, and patient records using transformer models and medical ontologies.

distractor_docs.title: Quantum Computing Applications in Cryptographic Security Protocols
distractor_docs.abstract: Quantum computing poses both opportunities and threats to current cryptographic systems. We present novel quantum algorithms for secure communication and analyze the implications for current encryption standards. Our findings suggest significant vulnerabilities in RSA and elliptic curve cryptography.

distractor_docs.title: CRISPR-Cas9 Gene Editing for Treatment of Inherited Retinal Diseases
distractor_docs.abstract: Inherited retinal diseases affect millions worldwide and currently have limited treatment options. This research investigates CRISPR-Cas9 gene editing approaches for correcting mutations causing Leber congenital amaurosis and Stargardt disease. We demonstrate successful correction in patient-derived organoids.

queries.query: COVID-19 vaccine effectiveness and safety profiles in elderly populations

correct_doc.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Effectiveness and Safety Profiles in Elderly Populations: A Systematic Review
correct_doc.abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic disproportionately affected elderly populations, making vaccination crucial for this demographic. This systematic review analyzes effectiveness and safety data from major COVID-19 vaccines (mRNA and viral vector) in adults over 65 years. We examine immunogenicity, adverse events, and real-world effectiveness across multiple countries and vaccine platforms.

distractor_docs.title: Machine Learning Models for Predicting Hospital Readmission Risk
distractor_docs.abstract: Hospital readmissions represent a significant healthcare burden and quality indicator. We develop and validate machine learning models using electronic health record data to predict 30-day readmission risk. Our ensemble approach combining clinical variables and natural language processing achieves superior performance.

distractor_docs.title: Climate Change Impact on Agricultural Crop Yields in Sub-Saharan Africa
distractor_docs.abstract: Climate change poses severe threats to food security, particularly in Sub-Saharan Africa. This study analyzes temperature and precipitation trends over 30 years and their correlation with crop yields for major staples including maize, sorghum, and cassava. We project future yield scenarios under different climate models.

distractor_docs.title: Novel Biomaterials for Bone Tissue Engineering Applications
distractor_docs.abstract: Bone tissue engineering requires scaffolds that promote cell growth and integration. We present novel composite biomaterials combining hydroxyapatite nanoparticles with biodegradable polymers. In vitro and in vivo studies demonstrate enhanced osteoblast proliferation and new bone formation.

queries.query: Transformer architecture optimization for natural language understanding tasks

correct_doc.title: Transformer Architecture Optimization for Natural Language Understanding Tasks
correct_doc.abstract: Transformer models have achieved state-of-the-art performance in natural language understanding, but computational efficiency remains a challenge. This paper presents novel optimization techniques including attention pruning, knowledge distillation, and dynamic inference to reduce model size and latency while maintaining performance on GLUE benchmarks.

distractor_docs.title: Psycholinguistic Factors in Second Language Acquisition Among Adults
distractor_docs.abstract: Adult second language acquisition involves complex cognitive processes that differ from child language learning. This study examines working memory, attention, and motivation factors affecting L2 proficiency in adult learners. We find significant correlations between cognitive flexibility and grammatical accuracy.

distractor_docs.title: Supramolecular Chemistry of Host-Guest Complexes in Drug Delivery
distractor_docs.abstract: Host-guest chemistry offers promising approaches for targeted drug delivery systems. We synthesize novel cyclodextrin derivatives and study their complexation with anticancer drugs. Molecular dynamics simulations and experimental binding studies reveal enhanced solubility and controlled release properties.

distractor_docs.title: Cardiac Catheterization Outcomes in Patients with Chronic Kidney Disease
distractor_docs.abstract: Patients with chronic kidney disease face increased risks during cardiac catheterization due to contrast-induced nephropathy. This retrospective analysis of 5,000 patients examines procedural outcomes, complications, and protective strategies including hydration protocols and contrast agent selection.

queries.query: CRISPR gene editing mechanisms and off-target effects in mammalian cells

correct_doc.title: CRISPR Gene Editing Mechanisms and Off-Target Effects in Mammalian Cells
correct_doc.abstract: CRISPR-Cas9 has revolutionized gene editing but off-target effects remain a concern for therapeutic applications. This study comprehensively analyzes Cas9 binding specificity, DNA repair mechanisms, and unintended genomic modifications in human cell lines. We identify predictive factors for off-target events and propose improved guide RNA design strategies.

distractor_docs.title: Smartphone-Based Mental Health Interventions for Depression and Anxiety
distractor_docs.abstract: Mobile health applications offer scalable interventions for mental health conditions. This randomized controlled trial evaluates the effectiveness of a smartphone-based cognitive behavioral therapy app for treating depression and anxiety. Results show significant improvements in PHQ-9 and GAD-7 scores.

distractor_docs.title: Quantum Dot Solar Cell Efficiency Enhancement Through Surface Passivation
distractor_docs.abstract: Quantum dot solar cells offer potential for next-generation photovoltaics but suffer from surface defects that limit efficiency. We demonstrate surface passivation techniques using organic ligands and inorganic shells that reduce charge recombination and improve power conversion efficiency to 16.2%.

distractor_docs.title: Blockchain Technology for Supply Chain Transparency in Pharmaceutical Industry
distractor_docs.abstract: Pharmaceutical supply chains face challenges with counterfeit drugs and lack of transparency. This paper presents a blockchain-based solution for tracking drug provenance from manufacturing to patient delivery. Our prototype demonstrates immutable record keeping and real-time authenticity verification.

queries.query: Nanoparticle drug delivery systems for cancer chemotherapy

correct_doc.title: Nanoparticle Drug Delivery Systems for Cancer Chemotherapy: Design and Clinical Translation
correct_doc.abstract: Conventional chemotherapy suffers from poor selectivity and severe side effects. Nanoparticle drug delivery systems offer targeted therapy approaches to improve therapeutic efficacy. This review examines liposomal, polymeric, and inorganic nanocarriers for anticancer drugs, analyzing their mechanisms, clinical trials, and regulatory challenges.

distractor_docs.title: Social Media Influence on Political Opinion Formation During Election Cycles
distractor_docs.abstract: Social media platforms significantly impact political discourse and voter behavior. This longitudinal study analyzes Twitter and Facebook data during three election cycles to understand echo chambers, misinformation spread, and opinion polarization. We identify key factors driving political engagement online.

distractor_docs.title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Medical Data Analysis
distractor_docs.abstract: Medical data analysis requires large datasets but privacy regulations limit data sharing. Federated learning enables collaborative model training without centralizing sensitive patient data. We demonstrate federated approaches for medical image classification and electronic health record analysis.

distractor_docs.title: Stellar Evolution Models for Low-Mass Stars in Globular Clusters
distractor_docs.abstract: Globular clusters contain some of the oldest stars in the universe, providing insights into early stellar evolution. This study presents improved stellar evolution models for low-mass stars, incorporating updated opacity calculations and convection theories. Results reconcile theoretical predictions with observed color-magnitude diagrams.
